name: Booyah!!! A Horror Story
description:
Booyah!!! A Horror Story is an interactive visual novel that tells the story of Katerellian "Kay" Roach and Scarlet Flowers, two miners operating a desolate outpost on Deimos, a moon rig situated in orbit around Mars. Their lives of quiet repetition are disrupted by a series of strange events, and soon it becomes increasingly clear: they have to work together to learn the secrets that sit beneath the partially-terraformed regolith of Deimos.

New content will be added soon!
